Can I purchase your coffee beans to brew at home?
responses: Certainly! Our coffee menu offers a variety of options to suit different preferences. From classic choices like Simple Coffee and Black Coffee to specialty drinks like Cappuccino, Americano, and Latte Macchiato, we strive to provide a diverse selection for our customers. Whether you prefer your coffee hot or cold, with or without milk, we have something for everyone.

What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

responses: We offer a range of vegan shakes like Avocado and Pumpkin, along with desserts such as Cranberry Orange pastry and Nutella Puff. For low-calorie options, we recommend Tomato Cheese waffle and Easy Spinach pastry. Our Mix Fruit Smoothie is a great high-protein vegan dish choice. Enjoy!
